description: Your close bond with an animal allows you to use magic that targets animals on yourself.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Animal companion or mount class feature.

sections.text: You can allow spells and effects that affect animals, animal companions, and special mounts to affect you, even if the spells do not normally affect creatures of your type. For example, you could cast animal growth or reduce animal on yourself, even though those spells normally affect only animals. An ally could cast raise animal companion on you to bring you back from the dead. An opponent could not cast charm animal or dominate animal on you unless you chose to allow the spell to affect you as if you were an animal.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Animal companion or mount class feature
name: Animal Soul
